channel.title: RCE on Trusted Cybersecurity
channel.description: Recent content in RCE on Trusted Cybersecurity

item.title: CVE-2024-48760. GestioIP Vulnerability: RCE
item.description: Information Description Attack Vector Upload a test file “README.txt” Upload a backdoor Reverse Shell Option 1: using the python script Option 2: using base64 and bash to execute the reverse shell Single Encode base64 or: double encode your payload (to avoid ‘+’ signs) Option 3: hosting a file and then calling for it Files Python script Server upload.cgi (backup file) Backdoor code Information Description An issue in GestiolP v.3.5.7 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via the upload function.
